name: Freljord
resume:
Journey to the icy wilderness of Freljord, where snow-covered peaks rise above ancient forests, and the mighty Frostguard protect their sacred lands.
   Wander through the frostbitten tundra, explore ancient ruins of a forgotten era, and witness the fierce tribal battles that define this unforgiving land.
presentation:
Step into the epic world of Freljord, a land of ice and legend.
Traverse through the frosty valleys and towering mountains, where the tribes of Freljord wage eternal conflict. Explore the ancient strongholds, uncover the mysteries of Ashe‚Äôs tribe, and experience the harsh but breathtaking beauty of this land.

Witness the frost giants, meet the legendary warriors of Freljord, and learn about the ancient magic that binds the land and its people.

Embark on a journey through this mythical frozen world with a 5-day exploration, where you‚Äôll experience thrilling adventures and uncover the secrets of Freljord‚Äôs past and future.

schedule.description1:
Explore the towering mountains and deep, frost-covered valleys of Freljord. Witness the beauty of the unyielding glaciers and meet the local tribes.
   Discover the magical forces that control the land‚Äôs winter storm.
schedule.description2: Visit the stronghold of the Frostguard, a powerful group of warriors dedicated to protecting the realm from external threats and preserving ancient traditions.

schedule.description1:
Meet the leaders of Freljord‚Äôs tribes. Learn about their cultures, beliefs, and the legendary figures who shaped their history.
   Participate in a traditional tribal council to witness the politics and alliances that govern the land.
schedule.description2:
Join an exhilarating winter hunt across the frozen landscape.
   Learn the ancient skills needed to survive in the harshest cold while hunting for mystical creatures that roam the tundra.

schedule.description1:
Discover ancient ruins buried beneath the ice, remnants of long-forgotten civilizations.
   Uncover the history of these civilizations, and learn about their downfall in Freljord‚Äôs cold grip.

Train with local shamans and magicians to learn the ancient ice magic of Freljord.
   Master the ability to manipulate the cold and the storm to survive the harshest conditions.
schedule.description2:
Meet some of the legendary champions of Freljord, including the mighty Ashe and the fearsome Sejuani.
   Hear their stories and experience their strength firsthand.
